org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.api

Interface ChannelSelector<T extends IOReadableWritable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of record which is sent through the attached output gate
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BroadcastPartitioner, DistributePartitioner, FieldsPartitioner, GlobalPartitioner, OutputEmitter, RecordOutputEmitter, RoundRobinChannelSelector, ShufflePartitioner, StreamPartitioner

    public interface ChannelSelector<T extends IOReadableWritable>
    Objects implementing this interface are passed to an OutputGate. When a record is sent through the output gate, the channel selector object is called to determine to which OutputChannel objects the record shall be passed on.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int[] selectChannels(T record, int numberOfOutputChannels)
      Called to determine to which attached OutputChannel objects the given record shall be forwarded.

    • Method Detail

      • selectChannels

        int[] selectChannels(T record,
                   int numberOfOutputChannels)
        Called to determine to which attached OutputChannel objects the given record shall be forwarded.
        Parameters:
        record - the record to the determine the output channels for
        numberOfOutputChannels - the total number of output channels which are attached to respective output gate
        Returns:
        a (possibly empty) array of integer numbers which indicate the indices of the output channels through which the record shall be forwarded
